modName: Teutonic and Knights of the Nine Hedge Knight Retexture
summary:
NOW IN HI-RES!

Retextures hothtrooper44\'s famous Hedge Knight Armor to a Teutonic Knight  or Knight of the Nine look.

changes Chest, Gloves and Boots- Helmet unchanged

you need the Original file to make it work
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13961
descriptionHtml:
NOW IN HI-RES!

if you occure the \"weird pixelated\" problem this is sometimes caused by convert junk leftover whatever- you can fix that with reconverting it yourself from dds. to dds. until i finally got my converting programm fixed. 

or try to increase your Texture Quality in Skyrim options.

Retextures hothtrooper44\'s famous Hedge Knight Armor to a Teutonic Knight  or Knight of the Nine look.

changes Chest, Gloves and Boots- Helmet unchanged

you need the Original file to make it work
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13961


[IMG]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/3185/frontlz.jpg[/IMG]
By [URL=http://profile.imageshack.us/user/knelrivendare]knelrivendare[/URL] at 2012-04-19

changes Chest, Gloves and Boots- Helmet unchanged.

you need the Original file to make it work
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13961

Link to my new Teutonic Knight Warhorse: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16133
_________________________________________________________________________

for more Teutonic Knight and Knight of the Nine stuff i recommend you the \"Knights of the Nine\" pack
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7796

for the Helmet one the screenshot check out the \"Witcher 2 Helmet\" pack
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7159

the Cloak on the Screenshot is taken from Cloaks of Skyrim mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12092 
with a little retexture by me to match the set more yo ucan find it in the download section.
_________________________________________________________________________

all Credit goes to hothtrooper44 for making that great Armor

if you occure the \"weird pixelated\" problem this is sometimes caused by convert junk leftover whatever- you can fix that with reconverting it yourself from dds. to dds. until i finally got my converting programm fixed. 

thanks to Shivvlan for finding out how to fix that.
author: KnelTotenschwur
